page.title: 05Public Houses
page.content: There are 3 public houses in Sutton and Carlton on Trent. They are all owned by large Brewery Interests and are not owned privately. They all sell beer, wine, spirits and tobacco.The Nags Head has 2 restaurants. The Lord Nelson and The Great Northern Railway Inn both serve food. The opening hours are 10.30am. to 2.30pm. and 6.0pm to 10.30pm There are no bed and breakfast facilities. The pubs are centres for village social life. 50% of the trade is from outside the village. Various clubs and societies centre on the pubs eg.darts, village quiz etc. Beer gardens and childrens play areas are provided. There is one hotel, the Old England, with restaurant.
